All In Notary

Here For All Of Your Notary Needs

Book Appointment

Why Choose All In Notary?

All In Notary provides Mobile and Remote Online Notary (RON) Services to the greater Dallas area, as well as many other states. As trusted dedicated professionals, we honor building strong relationships with our customers and clients. We take pride in delivering stellar customer service while providing a customized notary signing experience. We have performed hundreds of closings, including mortage refinancing, home equity loans and purchases. All In Notary is setting a new standard on how to notarize documents electronically without the client leaving their home.

We are Bonded, Insured, Certified and Background Checked through the NNA and NPBC as Certified Loan Signing Agents. As experienced Loan Signing Agents we focus on document preparations, backed with strong general notary knowledge, and an understanding of all critical documents. Our Committment is to ensure a smooth, efficient and customer friendly closing/signing process.

Knowledgeable

Understanding state laws for notarization, along with accurate document preparation are the keys to a successful notarization for all general notarial services.

Reliable

You can count on us to deliver your documents when you need them most. The amazing thing is that you don't have to leave your home, we notarize remotely online.

Trusted

Our clients can trust that we are here to serve them for all their notary needs. Honesty and trustworthiness are the pinnacles to ensuring our clients needs are met!

Services

General Notary

We provide general notary services, such as advance directives, notarial stamping, signature witnessing, oaths and affirmations.

Loan Services

Loan signings, mortage closings, title transfers, real estate documents, home equity loans and purchases.

Remote Notary

Providing remote online notary services for all almost all 50 states. Documents are signed using a secure online platform and completed in minutes.

Affidavits

Designation of beneficiaries, living trusts and more. Online platform used for ID verification and KPIs.

Legal Documents

Wills, custody and guardianship agreements, executorships, court documents, advance directives.

Trust Documents

Living trusts, gifting trust, asset protection trust, charitable trust, special needs trust, deeds of trust.

How Remote Online Notary Works

Get Your Documents Notarized Online In 3 Easy Steps

1. Upload and then submit your document here. A document, in PDF format must be uploaded prior to your appointment for preparation for electronic signing.

2. Schedule your appointment below by clicking one of the pricing card items in the next section. Your name, address and contact information are required for any notarization. Upon booking below you will be directed to our online scheduling platform.

3. Check your email for an invite meeting online. A document must be uploaded prior to your appointment for preparation for electronic signing. Be sure to check your junk/span folder as items can be moved to the folder.

Meet Your Notary Agent

Aisha Seabrook

Commissioned Certified Notary Signing Agent

Aisha Seabrook is the Founder and Owner of All In Notary LLC. She began working with family and friends to ensure they were able to get critical documents notarized. Aisha quickly became an experienced Notary Public Commissioned by the State of Texas, driven by integrity and passion. Her mission is to provide consistent, confidential and efficient notary solutions. Aisha has over 30 years of experience as a Human Resources professional and possesses a Master’s Degree in Labor and Employment Relations from Rutgers’s University. Aisha is a mentor and coach for new notaries.
